attributes.action: Approve other vaccines for use for COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
There are 5 types of covid-19 vaccines available:

https://www.immunology.org/coronavirus/connect-coronavirus-public-engagement-resources/types-vaccines-for-covid-19?fbclid=IwAR071lj0n-fQCOMus0dt88Zqfj3cRp-s7H6qL_OSOPuZrrZ0-3QmpzREB2M
attributes.background:
This petition is calling for UK government to approve other vaccine options e.g., inactivated, attenuated and protein vaccines.

Alternative options for staff to continue to wear PPE / test weekly to continue in their jobs for those that do not have the vaccines.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

Decisions about which vaccines to approve are a matter for the Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA), not the Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
